Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Northbound 34 South Michigan buses are rerouted via Langley, 134th, Indiana, 130th, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Langley, 134th, Indiana, 130th, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
